name: Plantiful
description:
Prequel to Stardew Valley in which the Grandfather tests your skill before giving you his farm. You must defend his favourite flower from hordes of hungry insects.

Made during Global Game Jam 2023, theme "Roots".

Credits:

Bubňa - Coding, Animation

Theo - Production, Game design, Sound

Yuffie (Insta - @megayuffie) - Graphics, Design

Wizardy (wizardy.cz) - Coding
